title: London during World War II time in color! [A.I. enhanced & colorized]

sources.title: London during World War II time in color! [A.I. enhanced & colorized]
sources.description: The original title of the B&W film is: "London Can Take It". It is a film made by an American correspondent who reports in 1941 on the resilience of the British people during the hardship of the nightly bombings by the German Luftwaffe. The original film has been carefully restored, enhanced & colorized with A.I, video software by me. Music: Original American commentary. Source: British Film Council.
